thread.title: Candy
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Candy

author: Candy
title: Candy
text: You can tell they're paid commission, they are a lil too eager when you walk in the door. But other than that great prices & they took good care of me when I made a purchase. I haven't received the bed frame I purchased just yet but I loved the floor model so I'm sure it'll be great.
